DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Ford Raises ' 95 Prices : The No . 2 U.S. auto_maker said prices on some 1995 models are being increased by an average 2.2 % , or $ 419 per vehicle , over 1994 versions.Prices for Ford ' s 1995 light-duty trucks will be announced later this summer . The company instituted a $ 200 price increase on 1994 models of its popular Explorer sport-utility vehicle . The increases are effective immediately , so dealers can take orders from customers ahead of the models ' Sept . 29 public introduction . The increases affect all models except the Contour , Probe , Mercury Mystique and Lincoln Continental . Prices on those will be announced later , Ford said . Last week , industry leader GM said it would raise ' 95 model prices by an average 2.5 % .
